text.__SUMMARY__:
Fritillaria tubiformis is a bulbous perennial plant in the lily family, native to Alpine regions of southwestern France and northern Italy.
SubspeciesFritillaria tubiformis var. burnatii (Planch.) Rouy
Fritillaria tubiformis subsp. moggridgei (Boiss. & Reut. ex Planch.) Rix
Fritillaria tubiformis subsp. tubiformis
